BatchGrantPermissions.name: BatchGrantPermissions
BatchGrantPermissions.description: Grants data lake permissions to one or more principals in a batch.

BatchRevokePermissions.name: BatchRevokePermissions
BatchRevokePermissions.description: Revokes data lake permissions from one or more principals in a batch.

GetDataAccess.name: GetDataAccess
GetDataAccess.description: Grants virtual data lake access permissions.

GetDataLakeSettings.name: GetDataLakeSettings
GetDataLakeSettings.description:
Retrieves data lake settings such as the list of data lake administrators and database
                                                and table default permissions.

GetEffectivePermissionsForPath.name: GetEffectivePermissionsForPath
GetEffectivePermissionsForPath.description: Retrieves permissions attached to resources in the given path.

GrantPermissions.name: GrantPermissions
GrantPermissions.description: Grants data lake permissions to a principal.

ListPermissions.name: ListPermissions
ListPermissions.description: Lists permissions filtered by principal or resource.

PutDataLakeSettings.name: PutDataLakeSettings
PutDataLakeSettings.description:
Overwrites data lake settings such as the list of data lake administrators and database
                                                and table default permissions.

RegisterResource.name: RegisterResource
RegisterResource.description: Registers a new location to be managed by Lake Formation.

RevokePermissions.name: RevokePermissions
RevokePermissions.description: Revokes data lake permissions from a principal.
